moves.2. Bc4: Dadian, by contrast, plays aggressive chess.
moves.2... Nd7: Way too conservative. Also blocks the QB.
moves.3... g6: Why? 3...P-K4 was definitely in order. Doubrava will choke to death if he doesn't claim some space.
moves.6. Ne6: And Doubrava resigns. His Queen will fall. His lack of fight cost him severely in this game.
